docs.lead_paragraph: Chances for the approval of the first new drug in years to treat obesity seemed to increase Tuesday morning after the Food and Drug Administration released its review of the safety and effectiveness of Vivus's pill, Qnexa.

headline.main: F.D.A. Review of Diet Pill Relieves Investors

docs.abstract: The regulatory agency released its examination of the safety and effectiveness of Qnexa, in advance of an advisory panel on Thursday.
docs.snippet: The regulatory agency released its examination of the safety and effectiveness of Qnexa, in advance of an advisory panel on Thursday.

docs.lead_paragraph: Heroin users in a few African cities have begun injecting other addicts’ blood, researchers say, in an effort to share the high or stave off the pangs of withdrawal.

headline.print_headline: Desperate Heroin Addicts Inject Blood of Other Users

docs.snippet: Heroin users in a few African cities have begun injecting other addicts’ blood, researchers say, in an effort to share the high or stave off the pangs of withdrawal.

docs.lead_paragraph: The National Institute on Aging's new guide for those caring for someone with Alzheimer's disease, which I recommended a few weeks ago, drew generally positive reviews from New Old Age readers.

headline.main: Answers for Tough Questions About Alzheimer's

docs.abstract: A new guide to caring for those with Alzheimer's does not shy away from difficult and sensitive issues.
docs.snippet: A new guide to caring for those with Alzheimer's does not shy away from difficult and sensitive issues.

docs.lead_paragraph: Questions are swirling over “Stop, Question, Frisk,” a tactic police increasingly pursue in the Brownsville neighborhood of Brooklyn.

headline.seo: Over 4 Years, Nearly 52,000 Police Stops in a Few Brooklyn Blocks
headline.main: A Few Blocks, 4 Years, 52,000 Police Stops
headline.print_headline: A Few Blocks, 4 Years, 52,000 Police Stops

docs.snippet: Questions are swirling over “Stop, Question, Frisk,” a tactic police increasingly pursue in the Brownsville neighborhood of Brooklyn.

byline.original: By RAY RIVERA, AL BAKER and JANET ROBERTS
